cards.rules_text:
No two mana spent to cast this spell may be the same color. For each color of mana spent this way:
• {W}: You gain 3 life.
• {U}: Scry 3, then draw a card.
• {B}: Each opponent loses 3 life.
• {R}: Create three 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens.
• {G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to three creatures you control.

Exile the top X cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until the end of your next turn.
[i]Baroque[/i] — If at least five {R} was spent to cast this spell, spell cast this way may be cast without paying its mana cost. If at least five {U} was spent to cast this spell, put up to two cards exiled by this spell into your hand.

Lifelink
[i]Baroque[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell, if at least {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} was spent to cast it, this creature gets +4/+4 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
